name: Onboard with maximum field length and special characters
description: Submit onboarding data with maximum allowed lengths and include special characters to test input handling, storage, and sanitization.
expectedOutcome: All fields within limits are accepted; data is stored after sanitization; no encoding, injection, or corruption issues; UI displays data correctly; downstream processes can proceed.
notes: Test fields like companyName up to 255 chars, address up to 500 chars. Include unicode characters and symbols. Verify no truncation beyond limits and that backend stores correctly.
